Em Resumo, o jogo √© mediano de forma geral, √© bonito e diferente mas isso n√£o ganha nota, dou uma nota de 4.0, √© muito mal balanceado, a comunidade √© geral √© muito toxica(mais a survivor do que a killer), tem muitas mecanicas mal pensadas na qual se pode abusar para obter vantagens(intencionalmente ou n√£o intencionalmente) como a SWF(survive with friends) e o Hit validation, o proprio sistema de mivimenta√ß√£o dos sobreviventes.
A BHVR-(criadora do jogo) cria propositalmente bugs para dar vantagens a um lado(survivors), isso fica claro com o tempo.
No total esse jogo s√≥ serve pra matar o tempo e nada mais :/ queria voltar no tempo e nunca ter comprado.

Only 50% of the game is playable, and to get all of the good stuff you have to pay for DLC. Theres perks in the game that are powerful that you dont have to pay more than base games price for, but theres a lot of extremely powerful perks that are either unlocked with a ton of playtime and buying them through the shrine or buying the dlc and ranking the characters up. Survivors are extremely favored to win whether youre in a survive with friends or not, killer is just too underpowered even with extremely powerful addons.

Edit 7/22/22: Game is still shit, dont buy.

Been playing this game since beta. Love/Hate relationship with this game and the devs.  

I have to give this game thumbs down. Considering that I haven't been able to rank up in over 3 months due to some bug that they're "working on". I've contacted them and they couldn't help me. 

Save your money.

-2020: i STILL feel the same way about the game and devs.
-2021: I will probably feel this way.
Dead by Daylight is fun, but requires hundreds of hours of grinding. This is not a game you can casually play as your a casual player has an in game disadvantage with weak perks and abilities.
Amazing horror game especially with friends <3
The game is highly unbalanced now. Matchmaking is idiotic. Game has more and more content, but old issues are never taken care of.

THIS GAME BRINGS ME UNIMAGINEABLE PAIN AND SUFFERING, IF YOU ENJOY BEING A SANE AND RATIONAL INDIVIDUAL, DO NOT PLAY THIS HORRENDOUS GAME

overall 10/10 experience
everytime I play this I ejeculate out of excitement, take that as you will.

ich liebe das spiel echt und spiele das jetzt wieder sehr aktiv nur diese op killer machen es oft kaputt man sollte die echt schlechter machen das man als √ºberlebener mehr chance hat zu √ºberleben. Es gibts viele korrekte leute in der Community doch killer die bei dir bleiben wenn du am haken bist ist echt der schei√ü dann bist du eigentlich schon tot und verliert garantiert ein rank punkt wenn das am anfang passiert weil der killer dich irgendwie direkt findet was ich oft hatte hoffe das spiel wird viele verbesserungen bekommen ;D  sch√∂nen tag euch allen noch und viel spa√ü beim zocken :D das spiel macht soo viel spa√ü:D hoffe wir werden das spiel am leben halten mit den entwicklern

Gayet cok iyi ve g√ºzel oyun herkese tavsiye ederim yapƒ±mcƒ±lar calƒ±≈üƒ±yor s√ºrekli g√ºncelleme geliyor oyun gittikce gelisiyor he an fiyati artabilir

Dead by Buglight, hier spielen 4 √ºberlebende Spieler gegen einen OP Killer, die √úberlebenden/Survivor/Survs k√∂nnen sich nur mit umwerfen von Paletten und mit Taschenlampen "wehren", indem der Killer gestunned/bet√§ubt werden.
Alles sch√∂n und gut, ich spielte das Spiel √ºber 1.700h mit viel Spa√ü und habe auch viele nette Menschen mit dem Game kennengelernt, die Community ist halt recht gro√ü, aber toxisch.
Die Entwickler hauen mittlerweile fast regelm√§√üig neue Skins raus, die man teils f√ºr verdiente Punkte und teils nur f√ºr Echtgeld kaufen kann. Dabei wissen die Entwickler, dass das Spiel sehr verbuggt ist.
Laut der Entwickler ist Campen und Tunneln eine Spielstrategie, die jedoch den Spielspa√ü sehr mindert, die Entwickler wollen da jedoch auch nichts gegen machen. Wobei es mir vorkommt, dass die Entwickler das Spiel sterben lassen wollen.
Zum Thema Tunneln, der Killer h√§ngt einen Surv an einen Haken, sobald dieser Spieler vom Haken gerettet wird, konzentriert sich der Killer auf den grad geretteten Surv und hat dabei sozusagen einen Tunnelblick.
Camper gehen nach dem aufh√§ngen eines Survs gar nicht oder nur minimal vom Haken weg, sodass das Retten fast unm√∂glich wird, da bringt auch das Perk geliehende Zeit nicht mehr viel.
alles in allem WAR es mal ein gutes Spiel, was durch diese ich sage mal Bitchmoves kaputt gemacht wird.
Ich rate vom Kauf ab! Es gibt viel bessere Spiele, die inkl. DLC nicht umbedingt √ºber 70‚Ç¨ kosten und die Community nicht so beschissen ist.
You need to be Fast af boi if you want play this game.

I remember when this game was in it's early test stages and it absolutely blew up on twitch! It's an amazing concept and very entertaining game that just hit the sweet spot. Horror with multiplayer pvp. It evokes some of the most scary, hilarious and intense game play of any game I've played. A lot people will avoid this title because of the brutality of the game. The killer goes around putting people on hooks. So that's understandable, it's not going to be for everyone. Four survivors team up to escape from the killer who is also a player. It makes for almost endless situations that can happen. One of the funnest games of all time hands down. It will 100% makes you laugh, scare you and give you a rush from pulling something awesome off.

I've streamed this game a lot and went from rank 20-1 as a killer multiple times. I really enjoy the bonus blood point weekends. The normal rate of progression feels too slow for me once you've played the game a lot and the initial fun fades. When you get into the sub rank 10 range you will run into killers and survivors running the same exact meta builds which gets annoying. I've also experienced a lot of toxicity playing as killer from the players. Which is to be expected honestly as this is a pvp game and you are literally murdering them and harvesting their souls.

My advice is play the way you want and play to win. Don't listen to people complaining. Or actually just mute chat that's the best! The game also has a lot of balance issues so a lot of perks and items are almost useless.

If you like dark, horror games and multiplayer you must try this game. 9.5/10

Before you consider buying this game, remember that here is no ranking system, here you'll have the worst hitboxes in your life, the slowest vaults you could ever see. Thus its impossible to play without a discord party. Also consider that here are some fucked up addons for killers that wont let you even play.

But if you really gonna buy this game, then good luck ruining somebody's game, cuz you wont be able to play this shit of a game even remotely good, as it takes so much time to master the mechanics developers screw every update.
Good game, gets your adrenaline pumpin when a killer is chasing you and pretty entertaining 9/10 for me.
bad game and will make you angry

in my 40's and im being told by KIDS with less than 10-4000 hours+ on the game that running in circles, abusing patterns, and setting up perk builds specifically for that one type of play style is how it was MEANT TO BE PLAYED?!?!?! :steamfacepalm: sorry guys but honestly there are just so many of you that abuse it, that to kick them out would kill the game...like 85% or better, im thinking 90-95% of players are rinse and repeat the easiest way to win. I'm sick of playing that tryhard game its too easy and boring...so they would literally knock their game population down to a pittance of what it is now. If they stopped people from being able to abuse the game to win then they would lose a lot more...we can't have that...these kids are so "special" they need to feel like they are as important as everyone else
why is it that if you dont escape there must be something wrong with the game...its called DEAD by daylight...not...escape by running in circles by daylight...almost everyone i see on this game cant take losing like it insults their humanity, or are less of a personm for losing ONE MATCH...WHO CARES its a GAME. Unfortunately there are mostly children who play this, and havent been taught to take a loss...Why? Because of participation awards...all dead by daylight has become is find your "I WIN" build then rinse and repeat... forever! whatever method gives you more wins than you can actually earn
I used to play this game like crazy and i loved it sometimes, but it was so fun, when it was actually fun, that it was worth dealing with the tryhards who NEED to win at all costs. But now i get like 1-2 gg's out of maybe 20! this game isnt worth playing anymore because its a measuring contest now...u win or lose, escape or die, and you gotta deal with these kids that have to brag or complain. This game is shot and ive got better things to play, without someone trying to belittle me so they can feel better about themselves and how disappointing their lives have become
good game, 0 camps 0 tunnels 0 toxic survs

sono veramente deluso dal gioco chiederei un rimborso se fosse possibile dopo essere arrivato al rank 12 come killer il gioco √® diventato impossibile ma non impossibile in quanto a difficolt√† ma in quanto a giocabilit√† 
¬∞le partite richiedono un tempo di ricerca superiore ai 20 minuti... quando un gioco nel 2019 dovrebbe avere un tempo MASSIMO di 5 minuti infatti se giochi sopravvissuto √® tutta un'altra cosa.... 
¬∞il matchmaking √® del tutto rotto come gi√† detto sono rank 12 come killer in partita mi capitano sopravvissuti di rank 2 rank 4 addirittura rank 1 rendendo il gameplay del tutto impossibile e privando chi gioca killer la possibilit√† di creare strategie nuove imparando piano piano senza dover esser costretto a fare il camper perch√© i sopravvissuti sono talmente bravi che in un mezzo secondo ti fanno 4 generatori
¬∞tutto il resto il gioco e il concetto in se sono stupendi il gioco potrebbe veramente essere uno dei migliori giochi online di steam peccato che non c'√® un matchmaking ottimale √® veramente penoso... e mi rifiuto di giocare sopravvissuto perch√© ho comprare il gioco per fare il fottuto killer non la checca che corre e urla.
chiederei un rimborso a steam se fosse possibile onestamente per poter comprare il gioco quando saranno seriamente ottimizzati i tempi di ricerca attenzione quindi prima di comprarlo pensateci se avete intenzione di giocare come killer beh... preparatevi a tempi d'attesa da sala parto in tutto questo mentre scrivevo la recensione stavo cercando la partita da gi√† 5 minuti e ancora niente beh una roba ridicola mi dispiace... veramente deluso.

It's a fun game that is much easier for the survivors when they can communicate, but it's still fun nonetheless, whether you are a team player or a lone wolf.

I felt the need to edit this review after 400 hours of gameplay. I made it sound golden because that's what I thought the game was. However, as I went on I realized the many mistakes, glitches, and bugs within the game. They eventually get patched but not nearly fast enough. I must say that despite all the bugs I do love this game. I've loved it since I bought it. I really wish they added maybe another gamemode or worked more and more to fix the game. Overall, the game isn't perfect, but it's worth a shot. I recommend it for all who are patient and determined.
